extDescription.message: Plugin de Encoding/Decoding para vários tipos de encoding como base64, rot13 ou conversão de unix timestamps

settings.description: Title of the settings dialog for the extension

message_type.description: How the converted text will be displayed

type_alert.description: Setting that enables the messages to be displayed in an alert box

type_console.description: Setting that enables the messages to be displayed in the JS console

type_html.message: Adicionar um elemento HTML ao final da página
type_html.description: Setting that enables the messages to be displayed in a HTML element inserted into the page

type_inplace.message: Usar a substituição de texto no lugar
type_inplace.description: Setting that enables the messages to be displayed as replacement of the original text

copy_results_to_clipboard.message: Copiar os resultados para a área de transferência (esteja ciente de que isso pode sobrescrever dados já presentes na área de transferência, então use com cuidado!)
copy_results_to_clipboard.description: Label of the checkbox that enables clipboard-copy post-conversion in the settings

activate_functions.description: Title of the part of the settings that (in)activates de/encoding functions

activate_functions_description.message: Você pode ativar e desativar as funções no menu de contexto.
activate_functions_description.description: Description for the part of the settings that (in)activates de/encoding functions

function_timestamp.description: Function name for UNIX Timestamp conversion

function_ascii2hex.description: Function name for ASCII to Hex

function_hex2ascii.description: Function name for Hex to ASCII

function_html_entity_decode.description: Function name for HTML entity decode

function_htmlspecialchars.description: Function name for HTML special chars encode

function_htmlspecialchars_decode.description: Function name for HTML special chars decode

function_quoted_printable_decode.description: Function name for Quoted printable decode

function_quoted_printable_encode.description: Function name for Quoted printable encode

message_copied_to_clipboard.message: Mensagem copiada para a área de transferência!
message_copied_to_clipboard.description: message when text was successfully copied to the clipboard

copy_last_conversion_to_clipboard.message: Copiar última conversão para a área de transferência

options_saved.description: Success message when the user settings where successfully saved
